item.title: Noobs can do so little lol
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

AddGlobalObject(2597, 3158, 377, -1, 10);//chest @ home

First add that
then you do this

case 377: //Strength Chest if (actionTimer == 0) { actionTimer = 58; sendMessage("bullets shoot at you and you dodge it!!!!!!"); addSkillXP((9500*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((9500*playerLevel[7]), 7); addSkillXP((9500*playerLevel[13]), 13); addSkillXP((9500*playerLevel[19]), 19); setAnimation(1110); } break;

You can add or decrease if you want you can make it hit once and give 99 str

Read full topic
